page.title: 03Shopping Survey Results
page.content: A quarter of the people questioned wished that Daventry had either a Marks and Spencer or Woolworths (as Northampton and Rugby have).It should be noted that 64% (nearly 2/3) could not think of any shops which were missing in Daventry.This is a reflection of the general satisfaction expressed in question one. People came shopping to Daventry from as far away as Milton Keynes (nearly 30 miles),though 3/4 of those questioned actually live in Daventry and 95% of shoppers live closer than 10 miles from Daventry.This suggests that the Daventry shopping centre is not attracting many people from long distances like Northampton or Milton Keynes does for example.
